mapper.select: SELECT id, name, description, url, readOnlyUrl FROM Protocol
SELECT id, name, description, url, readOnlyUrl FROM Protocol WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT Protocol.id AS id, Protocol.name AS name, Protocol.description AS description, Protocol.url AS url, Protocol.readOnlyUrl AS readOnlyUrl FROM Plenum_Protocol WHERE plenumId = #{plenumId} INNER JOIN Protocol ON Plenum_Protocol.protocolId = Protocol.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Protocol ( name, description, url, readOnlyUrl ) VALUES ( #{protocol.name}, #{protocol.description}, #{protocol.url}, #{protocol.readOnlyUrl} )
